metadata.feature_description: Test and validate URL rewriting functionality with detailed results

steps.action: Navigate to SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: Test URL Rewriting interface should be visible
steps.actual: Test URL Rewriting interface displayed with URL to Test input field and result fields

steps.action: Enter valid URL 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should process the URL and display rewriting results
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US, Identified Language: en-US, Identified Page: Our Products, Operation Messages: ActiveTab: 22/Our Products IsSecure: False

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL with complex query strings

steps.action: Enter URL with multiple query parameters 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products?category=tv&sort=price&order=asc&page=2&filter=active' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should process the URL with query strings and display results
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US&category=tv, Identified Language: en-US, Identified Page: Our Products. Query parameters were preserved in the rewriting result.

steps.action: Enter URL with special characters 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Test-amp-ltSpecial-gt-Page' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should properly handle URL-encoded special characters
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=132&language=en-US, Identified Language: en-US, Identified Page: Test & <Special> Page! (displayed as HTML entities). System correctly resolved URL with encoded special characters.

steps.action: Enter French localized URL 'http://localhost:8081/fr-fr/Our-Products' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should identify the French language code from URL path
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=fr-FR, Identified Language: fr-FR, Identified Page: Our Products. System correctly identified French locale from URL path.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test malformed URLs for error handling

steps.action: Enter malformed URL 'not-a-valid-url-format' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: System should handle the error gracefully and display appropriate error message
steps.actual: Rewriting Result: None, Identified Language: None, Identified Page: None, Redirection Result: None, Operation Messages: 'Invalid URI: The format of the URI could not be determined.' System properly handled malformed URL with informative error message.

observations: The URL Rewriting Testing feature is accessible via SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab (not Site Behavior as originally documented)
The feature provides comprehensive output including: Rewriting Result, Identified Language/Culture, Identified Page, Redirection Result, Redirection Reason, and Operation Messages
The TestUrlRewriting API endpoint requires Administrator role as per code review (DnnAuthorize StaticRoles = Administrators)
Error handling is robust - malformed URLs return 'None' for all result fields with a descriptive error message in Operation Messages
